content: Compose a horror story about a group of friends, comprising Sally, her paraplegic brother Franklin, Pam, Jerry and Kirk, going on a road trip to an abandoned farmhouse in Texas to check on the graves of their relatives, after hearing about cemetery vandalism. Along the way, they pick up a hitchhiker who unnerves them with his unsettling fascination with cattle slaughter. Write about the chilling encounters they have at a gas station, an ominous neighboring house, and a hunting cabin, unveiling a chainsaw-wielding psycho named 'Leatherface' and his twisted family involved in a gruesome business. Describe Sally's desperate fight for survival and eventual escape, leaving her scarred by the horrifying ordeal.
